mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select email from member where email = #{email}

select A.moviegrade_heart, A.movieinfo_title, A.movieinfo_num, B.movieinfo_poster from movie_grade A full join movieinfo B on A.movieinfo_num = B.movieinfo_num where A.id=#{id} and A.moviegrade_heart = 1 order by A.movieinfo_num desc

select A.moviegrade_star, A.movieinfo_title, A.movieinfo_num, B.movieinfo_poster from movie_grade A full join movieinfo B on A.movieinfo_num = B.movieinfo_num where A.id=#{id} and A.moviegrade_star != 0 order by A.moviegrade_star desc
select * from movie_ticketing where book_date = (select max(book_date) from movie_ticketing where id = #{id} )and rowNum = 1
